scripts.codegen:downloadSchema: dotenv -- bash -c 'aws appsync get-introspection-schema --api-id $APPSYNC_API_ID --format SDL cloudformation/schema.graphql'
scripts.s3:uploadTestData: aws s3 rm s3://epsilon-development-media --recursive && aws s3 sync s3://nurtai-pics-test s3://epsilon-development-media
scripts.s3:rm:meadi: . scripts/cf_exports.sh && aws s3 rm s3://$INFRASTRUCTURE_BUCKET_NAME --recursive --quiet && aws s3 rb s3://$INFRASTRUCTURE_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.pipeline:create: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $ASPAN_ENV_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.pipeline:update: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $ASPAN_ENV_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.pipeline:delete: npm run s3:rm:infra && . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name $ENV_NAME-pipeline
